section.title: Formatting expectations
section.p: Processors typically render the contents of the sup element placed higher in relationship to the surrounding text. Superscript text also is often a smaller font than the surrounding text.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The sup element is specialized from ph. It is defined in the highlighting-domain module.

example.title: Example
example.p: In the following code sample, the sup element is used to ensure proper formatting of the exponent in the number ten to the power of ten.
example.codeblock: The power produced by the electrohydraulic dam was 105 more than the older electric plant.
